title: Hextech Crafting on OCE??
body:
Dear Riot,

Would you have any indication when the Hextech crafting is coming to the OCE server.

Thank you for your time.

replies.body: Hopefully by the end of the week :D If not, probably sometime next week.
It seems like OCE is always getting shafted with new content. every other server get new content before us  {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
What else has come late to Oce? Don't we get skins, champions, sales usually at the same time? and I think we are the first Region to get the newest patch.
Yeah we not getting it for a while cause it is still in its early stages. So far there is only one 'Hextech' skin and that's for Annie
ummm, it's out on NA. Riot's just starting it in other servers one at a time.

"early stages" it's been in testing for like 3 months+

Riot are just doing their whole "we need to test it on each server because someone is going to fuck up." thing

Legit the amount of times we have received the same thing to find ours is bugged is astounding.

Fair points to you all, but it would be nice if we had some sort of indication, and ETA or even a 'soon'.  As a few of you have mentioned oce isn't the most feature rich server out there.  We have 1 normal q, only get TTL for a few days a week and never had the pleasure of dominion.  Just want to know that it IS coming, i guess I'm a bit paranoid when it comes to what we get and don't get.

As Yaia mentioned, this coming week provided no issues arise. We aren't last here, only two servers have it at the moment, and Korea will be getting it later than us.

It was mentioned it would be soon after 6.6, which has just rolled out, and in game we are seeing notifications when people get S rankings now, so it will be very soon.
Yeah honestly... NA already has it :/
